channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk is getting serious about orbital data centers
item.description: We’re starting to see the idea of Musk-owned orbital AI data clusters cohere into an actual plan.

item.title: One of Europe’s largest universities knocked offline for days after cyberattack
item.description: An alleged ransomware attack has taken down the systems of the Sapienza University of Rome.

item.title: A16z VC wants founders to stop stressing over insane ARR numbers
item.description: A16z VC Jennifer Li⁠, who oversees some of the firm's fastest growing AI companies, warns founders not to believe every ARR claim made on X.

item.title: Data breach at govtech giant Conduent balloons, affecting millions more Americans
item.description: The ransomware attack at Conduent allowed hackers to steal a "significant number of individuals’ personal information" from the govtech giant's system...

item.title: Fundamental raises $255 million Series A with a new take on big data analysis
item.description: Fundamental has built a new foundation model to solve an old problem: how to draw insights from the huge quantities of structured data produced by ent...

item.title: Trump’s critical mineral reserve is an admission that the future is electric
item.description: The administration's $12 billion stockpile of critical minerals is aimed at blunting China's influence. But it also revels the direction of the global...

item.title: The Washington Post is retreating from Silicon Valley when it matters most
item.description: The Bezos-owned newspaper gutted its San Francisco bureau and coverage of tech — including journalists reporting on Amazon and Blue Origin

item.title: OpenAI launches new agentic coding model only minutes after Anthropic drops its own
item.description: The new model is build to accelerate the capabilities of Codex, the agentic coding tool OpenAI launched earlier this week.

item.title: Motorola Moto Watch Review: Polar-Powered
item.description: Motorola partnered with Polar to make an Android smartwatch that delivers improved fitness stats.

item.title: Substack confirms data breach affects users’ email addresses and phone numbers
item.description: Substack said that customer data was accessed in October 2025, but wasn't discovered until early February.
